TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update the activity information of an IEDEvent and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an IEDEvent with specific activity information. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates the activity information of this IEDEvent. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the IEDEvent and its activity information is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_IEDC_919 and with the following activity information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDCacheDiscovery'
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the IEDEvent: ESP_ IEDC_919.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (1) updates the IEDEvent with the following activity information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDHoax'
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.
